page.title: 09OCCUPATIONS
page.content: Here are some of the jobs done by fathers- Oliver Bs father works in the Naval Dockyard on nuclear submarines as does Tristan's dad.Philip's father is a civil engineer while Daniel's dad is a quantity surveyor.Stephen's father is in insurance and loans,Oliver Ts father is a farmer.Mark's father is in the building trade and Eon's dad works in a naval armament depot. Kate's father teaches teachers and Josie's dad repairs cars.Vivienne and Sue's fathers work in the Naval Dock - yard,Rachel's dad is a shopfitter. Sarah's father is a mechanic for Shell oil and Claire's dad works as an architect for Fine Tubes,a Plymouth firm.
